Module net.sourceforge.joceanus.tethys.core
Package net.sourceforge.joceanus.tethys.core.chart

Class TethysUICoreBarChart

java.lang.Object
net.sourceforge.joceanus.tethys.core.base.TethysUICoreComponent
net.sourceforge.joceanus.tethys.core.chart.TethysUICoreBarChart
All Implemented Interfaces:
OceanusEventRegistrar.OceanusEventProvider<TethysUIEvent>, TethysUIComponent, TethysUIBarChart
public abstract class TethysUICoreBarChart extends TethysUICoreComponent implements TethysUIBarChart
Bar Chart.

The EventProvider fires the following events.

  • TethysUIEvent.PRESSED is fired when a bar is selected
